EmailTemplate.name: Hiring our Heroes survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Hiring our Heroes job fair survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in Hiring our Heroes job fair. Even if you decided not to attend, we’d like to get your feedback.
Please complete our brief survey and you’ll be entered into a drawing for 3 copies of the HBO acclaimed mini-series "The Pacific." Please click on <http://iava.org/hiring-our-heroes-job-fair-survey> to fill out the survey.
Your member number will be required in the survey, it is {!Contact.Membership_ID__c}.
Thank you for your helping us make our events even better.
Sincerely,
Jason Hansman Online Community Manager Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America
